member.name: M:Google.Apis.Admin.reports_v1.ActivitiesResource.List(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a list of activities for a specific customer and application.
member.param: Required - Represents the profile id or the user email for which the data should be filtered. When 'all' is specified as the userKey, it returns usageReports for all users.
Required - Must match pattern (admin)|(docs) - Application name for which the events are to be retrieved.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Admin.reports_v1.ActivitiesResource.ListRequest.Alt
member.summary: Data format for the response.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Admin.reports_v1.ActivitiesResource.ListRequest.Fields
member.summary: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Admin.reports_v1.ActivitiesResource.ListRequest.Oauth_token
member.summary: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Admin.reports_v1.ActivitiesResource.ListRequest.PrettyPrint
member.summary: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Admin.reports_v1.ActivitiesResource.ListRequest.QuotaUser
member.summary: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters. Overrides userIp if both are provided.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Admin.reports_v1.ActivitiesResource.ListRequest.UserIp
member.summary: IP address of the site where the request originates. Use this if you want to enforce per-user limits.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Admin.reports_v1.ActivitiesResource.ListRequest.ActorIpAddress
member.summary: IP Address of host where the event was performed. Supports both IPv4 and IPv6 addresses.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Admin.reports_v1.ActivitiesResource.ListRequest.ApplicationName
member.summary: Application name for which the events are to be retrieved.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Admin.reports_v1.ActivitiesResource.ListRequest.EndTime
member.summary: Return events which occured at or before this time.

member.summary: Name of the event being queried.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Admin.reports_v1.ActivitiesResource.ListRequest.Filters
member.summary: Event parameters in the form [parameter1 name][operator][parameter1 value],[parameter2 name][operator][parameter2 value],...

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Admin.reports_v1.ActivitiesResource.ListRequest.MaxResults
member.summary: Number of activity records to be shown in each page.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Admin.reports_v1.ActivitiesResource.ListRequest.PageToken
member.summary: Token to specify next page.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Admin.reports_v1.ActivitiesResource.ListRequest.StartTime
member.summary: Return events which occured at or after this time.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Admin.reports_v1.ActivitiesResource.ListRequest.UserKey
member.summary: Represents the profile id or the user email for which the data should be filtered. When 'all' is specified as the userKey, it returns usageReports for all users.
